keyword: calories in a large french fry from mcdonalds
title: Calories in a Large French Fry from McDonald's
meta_description: Discover calories in a large french fry from McDonald's, including carbs, fat, sodium, and quick nutrition facts based on official data.
h1: Calories in a Large French Fry from McDonald's
assumptions: Estimated from McDonald's large fries serving (154g, ~75 fries); assumes average large fry size (~2g), fried in vegetable oil blend, no dips.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by exact fry size, batch, location, and preparation; individual fries can differ. Check McDonald's app or site for latest serving data.

quick_answer.text: A single large McDonald's French fry contains about 8 calories, mostly from carbs and fat.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts style for easy comparison to full servings.

faqs.q: How many calories in one McDonald's large French fry?
faqs.a: Approximately 8 calories per individual large fry.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a large french fry from McDonald's?
faqs.a: About 1.1g carbs, with 0.1g fiber and 0g sugars.

faqs.q: Is there protein or fat in a single McDonald's fry?
faqs.a: Minimal: 0.1g protein and 0.4g fat per large fry.

faqs.q: How does sodium compare in one large french fry from McDonald's?
faqs.a: Around 5mg sodium, low per fry but adds up in a serving.

faqs.q: Calories in a full large McDonald's fries serving?
faqs.a: About 510 calories for the entire large portion (~75 fries).
